mapper.select: select count(*) from product where category=#{cgnum}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select p.*, e.dc_rate, (p.prod_price * ((100-NVL(e.dc_rate, 0))/100)) sale_price from product p, evt_product ep, event e where p.prodno = ep.prodno(+) and ep.evt_no = e.evt_no(+) order by p.prodno desc) a)

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select p.*, e.dc_rate, (p.prod_price * ((100-NVL(e.dc_rate, 0))/100)) sale_price from product p, evt_product ep, event e where p.prodno = ep.prodno(+) and ep.evt_no = e.evt_no(+) order by p.prodno desc) a) where category = #{cgnum}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select p.*, e.dc_rate, (p.prod_price * ((100-NVL(e.dc_rate, 0))/100)) sale_price from product p, evt_product ep, event e where p.prodno = ep.prodno(+) and ep.evt_no = e.evt_no(+) order by p.prodno desc) a) where prodno = #{prodno}
mapper.update: merge into basket b using dual on (b.prodno=#{prodno} and b.id=#{id}) when matched then update set b.bas_qty= b.bas_qty + #{bas_qty} when not matched then insert (b.prodno, b.id, b.bas_qty) values (#{prodno},#{id},#{bas_qty})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, a.* from (SELECT p.prodno, p.th_img, p.brand_name, p.prod_name, b.bas_qty, b.id, (b.bas_qty * p.prod_price) sale_price FROM product p, basket b WHERE p.prodno=b.prodno)a) where id=#{id}

SELECT p.*, e.dc_rate, (p.prod_price * ((100-NVL(e.dc_rate, 0))/100)) sale_price FROM wishlist w, product p, evt_product ep, event e WHERE p.prodno = ep.prodno(+) AND ep.evt_no = e.evt_no(+) AND w.id=#{id} AND p.prodno=w.prodno
